list_definition.definition: any public place in which discussions take place, speeches are made etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In modern times the television studio is as much a forum for public opinion as the market-places of ancient Rome used to be.

list_definition.definition: a market-place in ancient Roman cities and towns.
